MUX_TOKEN_ID.title: Mux API Token ID
MUX_TOKEN_ID.description: Your Mux API Token ID. You can find this in your Mux account settings.

MUX_TOKEN_SECRET.title: Mux API Token Secret
MUX_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Mux API Token Secret. You can find this in your Mux account settings.

MUX_WEBHOOK_SECRET.title: Mux Webhook Secret (optional)
MUX_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Your Mux Webhook Secret. This is used to verify webhook requests from Mux.

MUX_SIGNING_KEY.title: Mux JWT Signing Key (optional)
MUX_SIGNING_KEY.description: Your Mux JWT Signing Key. This is used for signing JWTs for secure video playback.

MUX_PRIVATE_KEY.title: Mux JWT Private Key (optional)
MUX_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Your Mux JWT Private Key. This is used for signing JWTs for secure video playback.
